headline: Assessing PulteGroup (PHM) Valuation As Backlog Shrinks And Revenue Is Forecast To Decline
summary: Recent commentary on PulteGroup (PHM) has focused on a shrinking backlog, weaker new orders, and a projected 6.6% revenue decline over the next year, along with flat earnings per share. See our latest analysis for PulteGroup. The recent concern around shrinking backlog and softer orders has coincided with a 1-month share price return of 5% and a 1-year total shareholder return of 9.05%. The very large 3-year and 5-year total shareholder returns suggest long term holders have still seen...
